titles.title: Jesus Lives, and So Shall I

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus lives, and so shall I; Death, thy sting is gone forever! He who deigned for me to die lives, the bands of death to sever. He shall raise me with the just: Jesus is my Hope and Trust.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus lives, and reigns supreme, and, His kingdom still remaining, I shall also be with Him, ever living, ever reigning. God has promised: be it must: Jesus is my Hope and Trust.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: Jesus lives, and by His grace, vict'ry o'er my passions giving, I will cleanse my heart and ways, ever to His glory living. Me He raises from the dust; Jesus is my Hope and Trust.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus lives! I know full well nought from Him my heart can sever, life nor death nor pow'rs of hell, joy nor grief, henceforth forever. None of all His saints is lost; Jesus is my Hope and Trust.

verse.name: v6
